page.title: 17A Shopping Centre Interview
page.content: We went to the shopping precinct to ask questions.Here are the questions (1.The Chemist 2.The Bakers 3.The Shoe shop 4.Rigbys)1.Do you like your job? 1.Yes 2.Yes 3.No 4.Yes 2.Have you had stubborn customers?1.Yes 2.Yes 3.Yes 4.Yes 3.Have you worked here long? 1.6 months 2.11 years 3.14 years 4.5 \ years.4.What started your job?1. Advertisement 2.Advertisement 3.Children starting school 4. Advertisement.5.Has the shop changed? 1.No 2.- 3.Yes 4.Yes 6.What do you like about this shop?1.Helping people 2.Working with friends 3.Its interesting 4.Talking to customers 7.Are you satisfied with your choice of job?1.Yes 2.Yes 3.No 4.Yes 8.Do you have a lot of customers? They all said yes.
